channel.title: Monerica - Newest and Sponsored Listings
channel.description: The latest additions and sponsors in our directory.

item.title: EarnMonero
item.description: Utilities > Developer Tools : A free Monero faucet where you can claim every 5 minutes.

item.title: ✅ MoneroDice (sponsored)
item.description: Businesses > Gambling : Simple, fast, privacy-respecting dice and blackjack game. Provably fair mode for dice is available too. - Contact: contact [at] monerodice.pro

item.title: StereoSwap
item.description: Exchanges > Instant Swaps : A privacy-focused swap platform designed for those who want full control over their crypto without compromises. We don’t ask for KYC, emails, or accounts.

item.description: Exchanges > Instant Swaps : Non-custodial instant swap between XMR and USDC (Arbitrum). No account, no KYC. Available via web, Telegram bot, and API. - Note: Also available as a Telegram bot for messaging-first users. Supports programmatic integrations via HTTPS API.
